tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Became the first player this season to record three eagles in one tournament—doing so at the Lanhai Open in late-May. Finished T57 at Lanhai International GC after making eagle at No. 3 in the first round and making eagle on No. 9 in both the third and final rounds...Opened with a 1-over 73 at the Taifong Open in Chinese Taipei in late-July. At the Asian Development Tour event at Taifong GC, recovered with three par-or-better rounds over his final 54 holes to T20.

2014: Finished 12th at the Haikou qualifier for the PGA TOUR China Series to earn a full exemption to the inaugural season….Made his first cut when he was T36 at the Mission Hills Haikou Open…Added a T32 at the Buick Open…Was T31 at the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open…Grabbed his first top-10 of the season with a T10 effort at the Lanhai Open in early June. Was tied for fourth, four strokes behind 36-hole leader Steve Dartnall but dropped down the leaderboard when he fired rounds of 71-76 (3-over) on the weekend…Earned his second consecutive top-10 when he T7 at the Earls Beijing Open in mid-June. Enjoyed weekend rounds of 68-67 in mid-June and had four par-or-better rounds overall at Earls Beijing GC…Added a T40 at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open and a T36 at the Jianye Tianzhu Henan Open. Was in position in Henan for a solid finish, tied for 15th with a round to play and seven off the lead. Struggled on the final day, shooting an 8-over 80…In late-November, shot a 2-under 70 in windy, warm conditions at the Hainan Open to T20.
2013: Best finish was a 21st-place showing at the PGM LADA Langkawi Masters on the Asian Development Tour. Shot rounds of 70-68-70-73.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Amateur: Played in the 2009 Asian Amateur Championship. Finished 27th, with the highlight a third-round 67 at Mission Hills GC in Shenzhen… Missed the cut by one shot at the 2010 Asian Amateur at Kasumigaseki CC in Japan, shooting rounds of 76-77.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T7th in 2014 at the Beijing Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 59th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
